TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but cars are not exactly aerodynamically stable. The hovercar also requires something denser than air to push against, so while flying over an ocean you tumble and crash.

I wish for warp drive nao.

True, but it obliterates everything within 4383567890956 AU, including you.

I wish cheese and lolcats.

Granted, but the cheese is mouldy and the cats aren't funny.

I wish for a bug-free KSP.

Granted,but suddenly You press a Random button and KSP crashs your computer due to alot of bugs.

I wish That I could Have a antigravity car and drive upside down..

True, the "antigravity" works by destroying the earth.

I wish for 84686538245777777777777777777777777726527645238454825284237452365643248352423584623423452376453264536532765444423852368452364854238342586438 years to be how long the person below me lives if he/she does not corrupt my wish!

ERROR ERROR ERROR 5003424 Please restart your computer. Invalid wish. "begin format script wish text.txt",Wish Granted,but a million yaks fall on you "end text"

I wish for gravity to be turned off for one second,But it will not damage our body.

Granted. Every galaxy begins to shake violently. A star crashes into the earth, killing everyone.

I wish for brains to be indivisible while they are alive.

Granted, you don't have one.

I wish to not want any more wishes.

Granted, you're no longer $entient.

I wi$h for a million buck$.

Granted. You receive one million Zimbabwean Dollars.

I wish that the above poster's "S" key works again.

Granted. Everybody elÃ…Â¿eÃ…Â¿ though turnÃ…Â¿ into an 'Ã…Â¿'.

I wiÃ…Â¿h ÃƒÂ¾e letter ÃƒÂ¾orn waÃ…Â¿ Ã…Â¿till in ÃƒÂ¾e alphabet.

Granted,but The god of the alphabet casts you a spell and you die.

I wish for the world to Be healthy. And everyone Invented Non-Coal things using our renewable resources

Granted. The world is healthy now. Since only living things can be healthy or not, the Earth is now alive and eats things. Humankind is the first to be eaten.

I wish for humankind not to be eaten.

Granted. Aliens cook and serve Earth, but never eat it.

I wish I had a speck of dust.

You get the speck, but it's Uranium, and it kills you.

I wish our moon was an Orca the size of our moon.

Edited December 10, 2014 by RAINCRAFTER

Granted. The orca obtains a sniper rifle and becomes xXxXX_OrCa_MLG_ScRuB_Sl4y3r_XXxXx and 360 quickscopes Earth.

I wish I had an XxXxX_0pT1k_S34GULL_XxXxX

granted. it 420 degree noscopes you.

IO wish to be on the first IXS class

Granted. The first mission pretty much follows the plot of Event Horizon.

I wish Purolator would hurry up and deliver my package in an undamaged condition.

Granted: your package has been delivered 1 second ago, in counterfeit condition.

I wish to divide by 0.

granted. the trade-of stops quantum vacuum thrusters, nuke salt water rockets, and Alcubicure (? is it spelt like that?) Drives working.

I wish for someone to find a military application for the IXS so the US government actually puts funds in

Granted, but it's the stereotypical US government, so...

I wish I had a slice of American Cheese

Granted. American Cheese is made out of CHEMICALS. It is banned from the everywhere.

I wish that the universe was a cat.

granted. it has a mushroom growing in it.

I wish that the IXS class will be launched this century and wikll succed and I will be alive to see it and not die 3 days afterwards but a few years at the smallest and not be in some kind of weird parasite coma.

Granted. Instead of humans, it launches lots of potatoes (safety raisins). The potatoes warp into another solar system and become the overlords of all life.

I wish for brains to be considered a type of computer.

Granted. They also become laggy

I wish I was actually paying attention to the plane I'm flying in War Thunder right now
